S03n253:1: parahitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante |
S03n253:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila anyatamasmin nāgavane puṣpaphalapallavālakṣitaśikharairalaṃkṛta iva tatra taruvarataruṇairvividhavīruttarutṛṇapihitabhūmibhāge vanarāmaṇīyakanibaddhahṛdayairanutkaṇṭhitamadhyāsyamāna iva parvatasthalairāśrayabhūte vanacarāṇāṃ gambhīravipulasalilāśayasanāthe mahatā nirvṛkṣakṣupasalilena kāntāreṇa samantatastiraskṛtajanānte mahākāya ekacaro hastī babhūva |
S03n253:4: sa tatra taruparṇena bisena salilena ca |
S03n253:6: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvastasya vanasya paryante vicaran yatastatkāntāraṃ tato janaśabdamupaśuśrāva |
S03n253:9: evaṃ mahatkāntāraṃ ca vyatītya mṛgayāpi na yujyate prāgeva mahāsamārambhaparikhedamasmatsayūthyagrahaṇam |
S03n253:11: nirvāsitā vā kruddhena rājñā svenānayena vā ||2 ||
S03n253:14: tajjñāsyāmi tāvadenamiti sa mahāsattvaḥ karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇo yataḥ sa jananirghoṣo babhūva tataḥ prasasāra |
S03n253:15: viṣpaṣṭataravilāpaṃ ca viṣādadainyavirasaṃ tamākranditaśabdamupaśṛṇvan kāruṇyaparyutsukamanāḥ sa mahātmā drutataraṃ tato'bhyagacchat |
S03n253:16: nirgamya ca tasmādvanagahanānnirvṛkṣakṣupatvāttasya deśasya dūra evāvalokayan dadarśa saptamātrāṇi puruṣaśatāni kṣuttarṣapariśramamandāni tadvanamabhimukhāni prārthayamānāni |
S03n253:17: te'pi ca puruṣāstaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dadṛśurjaṅgamamiva himagiriśikharaṃ hīnārapuñjamiva śaradvalāhakamiva pavanabalāvarjitamabhimukhamāyāntam |
S03n253:18: dṛṣṭvā ca viṣādadainyaparītā hantedānīṃ naṣṭā vayamiti bhayagrastamanaso'pi kṣuttarṣapariśramavihatotsāhā nāpayānaprayatnaparā babhūvuḥ |
S03n253:22: bhaiṣṭa na vo bhayamasti matta iti samucchritena snigdhābhitāmrapṛthupuṣkareṇa kareṇa samāśvāsayannabhigamya karuṇāyamāṇaḥ papraccha-ke'trabhavantaḥ ?
S03n253:26: atha te puruṣāstasya tena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇābhayapradānābhivyañjakena cābhyupapattisaumukhyena pratyāgatahṛdayāḥ samabhipraṇamyainamūcuḥ-
S03n253:32: svapne'pi tvadvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko hi nāpadamuttaret ||8 ||
S03n253:33: athainān sa dviradavara uvāca-atha kiyanto'trabhavanta iti ?
S03n253:37: etāni tu syurdviradapradhāna saptāvaśeṣāṇi nṛṇāṃ śatāni |
S03n253:38: nimajjatāṃ mṛtyumukhe tu yeṣāṃ mūrtastvamāśvāsa ivābhyupetaḥ ||10 ||
S03n253:41: ghṛṇāvimuktā bata nirvyapatrapā nṛpasya buddhiḥ paralokanirvyathā |
S03n253:43: avaiti manye na sa mṛtyumagrataḥ śṛṇoti pāpasya na vā durantatām |
S03n253:44: aho batānāthatamā narāḍhipā vimarśamāndyādvacanakṣamā na ye ||12 ||
S03n253:46: idaṃ sattveṣu nairghṛṇyaṃ dhigaho bata mūḍhatām ||13 ||
S03n253:47: atha tasya dviradapatestān puruṣān karuṇāsnigdhamavekṣamāṇasya cintā prādurabhūt evamamī kṣuttarṣaśramapīḍitāḥ paridurbalaśarīrā nirudakamapracchāyamanekayojanāyānaṃ kāntāramapathyādanāḥ kathaṃ vyatiyāsyanti ?
S03n253:48: nāgavane'pi ca kiṃ tadasti yenaiṣāmekāhamapi tāvadaparikleśena vārtā syāt ?
S03n253:49: śakyeyuḥ punarete madīyāni māṃsāni pātheyatāmupanīya dṛtibhiriva ca mamāntraiḥ salilamādāya kāntārametannistarituṃ nānyathā |
S03n253:58: athainamanye kṣuttarṣaśramadharmaduḥkhāturaśarīrāḥ kṛtāñjalayaḥ sāśrunayanāḥ samabhipraṇamyārtatayā hastasaṃjñābhiḥ pānīyamayācanta |
S03n253:59: tvaṃ no bandhurabandhūnāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ ca naḥ |
S03n253:62: apare tvenaṃ dhīrataramanasaḥ salilapradeśaṃ kāntāradurgottāraṇāya ca mārgaṃ papracchuḥ-
S03n253:63: jalāśayaḥ śītajalā saridvā yadyatra vā nairjharamasti toyam |
S03n253:64: chāyādrumaḥ śādvalamaṇḍalaṃ vā tannod vipānāmadhipa pracakṣva ||19 ||
S03n253:66: anukampāṃ puraskṛtya tāṃ diśaṃ sādhu nirdiśa ||20 ||
S03n253:67: saṃbahulāni hi dinānyatra naḥ kāntāre paribhramatām |
S03n253:69: atha sa mahātmā taiḥ karuṇaiḥ prayācitaisteṣāṃ bhṛśataramākleditahṛdayo yatastatkāntāraṃ śakyaṃ nistartu babhūva,
S03n253:70: tata esāṃ parvatasthalaṃ saṃdarśayannabhyucchritena bhujagavarabhogapīvareṇa kareṇovāca-asya parvatasthalasyādhastātpadmotpalālaṃkṛtavimalasalilamasti mahatsaraḥ |
S03n253:72: tatna ca vyapanītagharmatarṣaklamāstasyaiva nātīdūre'smātparvatasthalātpatitasya hastinaḥ śarīraṃ drakṣyatha |
S03n253:73: tasya māṃsāni pātheyatāmānīya dṛtibhiriva tasyāntraiḥ salilamupagṛhyānayaiva diśā yātavyam |
S03n253:75: iti sa mahātmā tān puruṣān samāśvāsanapūrvakaṃ tataḥ prasthāpya tato drutataramanyena mārgeṇa tadgiriśikharamāruhya tasya janakāyasya nistāraṇāpekṣayā svaśarīraṃ tato mumukṣurniyatamiti praṇidhimupabṛṃhayāmāsa-
S03n253:76: nāyaṃ prayatnaḥ sugatiṃ mamāptuṃ naikātapatrāṃ manujendralakṣmīm |
S03n253:77: sukhaprakarṣaikarasāṃ na ca dyāṃ brāhmīṃ śriyaṃ naiva na mokṣasaukhyam ||11 ||
S03n253:78: yatvasti puṇyaṃ mama kiṃcidevaṃ kāntāramagnaṃ janamujjihīrṣoḥ |
S03n253:80: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā pramodādagaṇitaprapātaniṣpeṣamaraṇaduḥkhaṃ svaśarīraṃ tasmād giritaṭādyathoddeśaṃ mumoca-
S03n253:97: tamarcituṃ bhaktivaśena kecana vyarāsayan dyāṃ suradundubhisvanaiḥ |
S03n253:99: diśaḥ saratkāntimayīṃ dadhuḥ śriyaṃ raveḥ karāḥ prāṃśutarā ivābhavan |
S03n253:101: atha te puruṣāḥ krameṇa tatsaraḥ samupetya tasmin vinītadharmatarṣaklamā yathākathitaṃ tena mahātmanā tadavidūre hastiśarīraṃ naciramṛtaṃ dadṛśuḥ |
S03n253:103: bhrātā nu tasyaiṣa mahādvipasya syād bāndhavo vānyatamaḥ suto vā |
S03n253:104: tasyaiva khalvasya sitādriśobhaṃ saṃcūrṇitasyāpi vibhāti rūpam ||31 ||
S03n253:107: atha tatraikeṣāṃ nipuṇataramanupaśyatāṃ buddhirabhavat-yathā paśyāmaḥ sa eva khalvayaṃ digvāreṇendrapratispardhirūpātiśayaḥ kuñjaravara āpadgatānāmabandhusuhṛdāmasmākaṃ nistāraṇāpekṣayā giritaṭādasmānnipatita iti |
S03n253:117: ādeśayan mārgamimaṃ ca yenaḥ sa eṣa dīrghāṅgalipuṣkaraḥ karaḥ ||36 ||
S03n253:120: suhṛttvamasmāsu batedamīdṛśaṃ suhṛtsu vā bandhuṣu vāsya kīdṛśam || 37 ||
S03n253:125: na rūpaśobhā ramate vinā guṇairjano yadityāha tadetadīkṣyate ||39 ||
S03n253:130: atha tān bandhuvyasan eva śokānuvṛttipravaṇahṛdayān sāśrunayanān gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhānavekṣya kāryāntaramavekṣamāṇā dhīrataramanasa ūcuranye-na khalvevamasmābhirayaṃ dviradavaraḥ saṃpūjitaḥ satkṛto vā syāt |
S03n253:140: nistīrya cedaṃ vyasanaṃ samagraiḥ pratyekaśo vā punarasya pūjā |
S03n253:141: kariṣyate nāgavarasya sarvaṃ bandhoratītasya yathaiva kṛtyam ||45 ||
S03n253:142: atha te puruṣāḥ kāntāranistāraṇāpekṣayā tasya dviradapaterabhiprāyamanusmarantastadvacanamapratikṣipya tasya mahāsattvasya māṃsānyādāya dṛtibhiriva ca tadantraiḥ salilaṃ tatpradarśitayā diśā svasti tasmātkāntārādviniryayuḥ |
S03n253:143: tadevaṃ parihitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante,
S03n253:146: satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇe ca bhadraprakṛtiniṣpādanavarṇe'pi vācyam-evaṃ bhadrā prakṛtirabhyastā janmāntareṣvanuvartata iti |
S03n253:148: yaccoktaṃ bhagavata parinirvāṇasamaye samupasthiteṣu divyakusumavāditrādiṣu-na khalu punarānanda etāvatā tathāgataḥ satkṛto bhavatīti,
